name: 时空之海（Space Time Ocean）
description:
The space where people live is called the Sea of Time and Space, and there are islands wrapped in foam of time and space. Filled with various unknown dangers and pleasures, whether it's planets, nebulae, or galaxies, there are numerous different creatures and resources.

In the chaotic space-time, you were randomly transported to a small open space. You may feel lonely and helpless, but you must embrace the will to survive and explore new lands. Players will have their own small base to embark on an adventure.

In this world, everything needs to be built with one's own hands, from the main base to the roads and buildings connected to other players, all of which require continuous collection and use of different resources to complete. Players not only need to master different tools and one person's power is limited, but only by collaborating with other players can they quickly expand their base, build more facilities, obtain more resources, strengthen their own strength, and better cope with unknown risks and challenges ahead.

Explore new fields. It is necessary to understand the situation in the "foam of time and space". Adventures will bring many valuable resources, and will also meet other explorers to establish broader alliances and communication channels.

In this world, it is inevitable to encounter some unknown and dangerous things. In the process of exploration and expansion, players may encounter unknown creatures, be troubled by storms, and even be attacked by hostile forces. This means that in addition to personal strength, everyone must remain vigilant and courageous.

It should be noted that you need to ensure that you have sufficient reserves of resources to cope with difficulties and dangers.

Although one can fight alone, collaborating with other players is the key to achieving higher victories, bringing more fun and creativity to this starry world.

In the sea of time and space, everyone will gradually understand the imagination and mystery of this world, explore its secrets, and strive for their own life and the prosperity of the alliance.

This world encourages players to trust each other, work together, enjoy battles and adventures, and showcase strong creativity and courage.



1. Obtain building materials to create a path for free walking in space.

2. Join other players on the road or reach the island to obtain rare materials, build advanced equipment, and survive better.

3. Players who leave the road will fall into spatiotemporal turbulence, and some items will be lost.

4. Players can fly other players into the chaos of time and space, or demolish buildings built by other players.

5. Advanced equipment has the ability to continuously open up for attacks, flights, and more.
